uvi.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.13.4
uvi.description:
scsi: core: Fix bad pointer dereference when ehandler kthread is invalid

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13.4 by commit c1671d2d2ef8a84837eea1b4d99ca0c6a66fb691, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 66a834d092930cf41d809c0e989b13cd6f9ca006. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: core: Fix bad pointer dereference when ehandler kthread is invalid
